text: dau che neah puokvea( preah neanea) pitchea ban bdeseth nung puok anak nouv avei del puok anak niyeay( tha puokvea noh chea preah) . haey puok anak min ach kech phot( pi tearounakamm robsa yeung) ban laey haeyka kmean anak na chuoy der . haey anaknea del bampean knongchamnaom puok anaknoh yeung nung aoy ke phloksa nouv tearounakamm da thngonthngor bamphot
